analysis.key_quote: I am concerned that this proposed rule, in removing access to appeal procedures, will give workers fewer chances to stand up for themselves and may produce a culture of draconian cuts and fear in the federal workforce.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concern about the removal of appeal procedures and the potential for politicization of the federal workforce, indicating opposition to the proposed rule. It highlights the importance of worker protections and the risks of creating a culture of fear, which aligns with themes opposing the rule.
